text: These are the official results of the Men's Pole Vault event at the 1993 IAAF World Championships in Stuttgart, Germany. There were a total of 45 participating athletes, with two qualifying groups (the qualification mark was set at 5.70m). The final was held on Thursday August 19, 1993. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Sergey Bubka Ukraine (UKR) |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Grigoriy Yegorov Kazakhstan (KAZ) |- |bgcolor="CC9966" rowspan=2|Bronze|| Maksim Tarasov Russia (RUS) |- | Igor Trandenkov Russia (RUS) |} ==Schedule== * All times are Central European Time (UTC+1) {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- !colspan="2"|Qualification Round |- !Group A !Group B |- |17.08.1993 – 16:40h |17.08.1993 – 16:40h |- !colspan="2"|Final Round |- |colspan="2"|19.08.1993 – 17:00h |} ==Abbreviations== * All results shown are in metres {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- |bgcolor="ccffcc"| Q || automatic qualification |- |bgcolor="ddffdd"| q || qualification by rank |- |DNS || did not start |- |NM || no mark |- |WR || world record |- |AR || area record |- |NR || national record |- |PB || personal best |- |SB || season best |} ==Results== ===Qualifying round=== * Held on Tuesday 1993-08-17 Qualification: Qualifying Performance 5.75 (Q) or at least 12 best performers (q) advance to the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
